summary: Texture replacer for female wolf armor which is a bit more revealing
descriptionHtml:
AURABEAT\'S Revealing Wolf Armor


DESCRIPTION

This mod is a texture replacer for female wolf armor which is a bit more revealing. It\'s not exactly how I had envisoned it, but is the best I could do with my current modding knowldege. I hope you enjoy and let me know what you think.   

INSTALLING

Once you have downloaded and extracted the mod, simply place the folder named \"textures\" and \"meshes\" into your Skyrim \"Data\" 

folder. For most of you, this will be: 

C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

UNINSTALLING

To uninstall, simply enter the \"Data\" folder in your Skyrim directory, then enter \"textures\\armor\" and \"meshes\\armor\" then delete the folder named \"wolf\".

PLEASE NOTE

This mod replaces the texture of the female wolf armor, so as long as this mod is installed you will not see the original version in game.
author: Aurabeat
